title: In setback for Oberoi Group flagship, SC confirms order to hand over Shimla's Wildflower Hall to Himachal govt
description: The Himachal Pradesh High Court, in the first week of January, had allowed a petition from the state government and directed EIH to vacate the historic luxury property located in Mashobra, Shimla.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
